title: Naturopathic Medicine Services in Portland, Eugene, & Florence at Oregon Integrated Health — Oregon Integrated Health & OIH DirectCare
description: Oregon Integrated Health has modern clinics located in Portland, Eugene, and Florence Oregon. Our integrated health clinic combines holistic health with primary care. Naturopathic Medicine Services in Portland, Eugene, & Florence at Oregon Integrated Health
cleaned_text: Naturopathic Medicine Services We believe strongly in the importance of treating the whole person and helping others to live as their optimum selves by providing our patients with as much information and options for obtaining health. This includes naturopathic, complementary, and alternative medicine. The goal of treatment should not be to merely manage a diagnosis, but to help each person to thrive and develop comprehensive treatment plans that support all aspects of a person's health. We work with our patients to provide realistic goals, the most minimally invasive care possible and holding both our practice and our patients' health to the highest standard.
